itunes:subtitle: Jevon McCormick, co-founder of Scribe Media, talks about being raised by a drug-dealing pimp in Dayton, Ohio, why he’s fiscally conservative despite growing up so poor he had to eat out of trashcans, and why we need more community support for poor childr...
itunes:summary:
Jevon McCormick, co-founder of Scribe Media, talks about being raised by a drug-dealing pimp in Dayton, Ohio, why he’s fiscally conservative despite growing up so poor he had to eat out of trashcans, and why we need more community support for poor children.
